gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains 50 meter gridded snow depth measurements acquired using the RIEGL LMS-Q1560 long-range airborne laser scanner system. Data were collected as part of the NASA/JPL Airborne Snow Observatory aircraft survey campaigns.
